meanings.definition: The condition of having identical alleles at a particular gene locus.
meanings.sent1: Homozygosis means having the same genes at a specific spot.
meanings.sent2: In genetics, homozygosis refers to having matching alleles at a gene location.
meanings.sent3: At the gene party, homozygosis brought identical twins!
meanings.sent4: The garden of homozygosis bloomed with identical flowers.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a world where everything is homozygosis - complete genetic twins!
